busquedachild.Nombre_Proyecto: Elimination of CFC-11 and CFC-12 in the manufacture of commercial refrigeration equipment at Refrigeracion Supernordico Ltda.
Conversion of CFC-12 to HFC-134a technology in the production of MAC systems at Thermo-coil, Calaires, Auto Aires, and Servi Aires
busquedachild.Compañia: Thermo-Coil, Calaires, Auto Aires, Servi Aires
